column4: hi, I still have firefox 1.5, synaptics didn't update it to 2.0 how do I update it to 2.0?
then you'll probably have to enable another repo
you don't have to upgrade to edgy
i have an error cause my beryl repos is missing
you can worry about that after the upgrade
weird, were you following the exact intructions
try doing the following, hold on a little
gksudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list the replace all the places were it says "dapper" with "edgy", then save it and do "sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get -y dist-upgrade
if you want to upgrade to edgy
